title: 3D Virtual World-Based Science Learning Effectiveness Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Science content learning combining instructor avatar guidance and self-directed exploration in a smartphone-based 3D virtual learning environment

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain over 70% of scientific concepts guided by an instructor avatar in a 3D virtual world.
Learners can describe at least three specific molecular interactions through micro-particle structure simulations in virtual environments.
Learners can write project reports based on phenomena observed after self-directed exploration in 3D virtual learning spaces via mobile devices.

resources: Avatar Tutorial for Science Concept Mapping
Quiz App for Measuring Learning Outcomes
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
